localize.title: Buzzing on Reddit
localize.description: See what's buzzing on Reddit in your native language

blogPost.excerpt: Doppler is a beautifully designed music player designed and built for people who buy music. Import music and playlists to listen offline, and edit song and album artwork and info without syncing. Now with support for Siri, Spotlight Search, and CarPlay.
blogPost.body: Doppler is a beautifully designed music player designed and built for people who buy music. Import music and playlists to listen offline, and edit song and album artwork and info without syncing. Now with support for Siri, Spotlight Search, and CarPlay.
blogPost.title: Doppler 2.3 - iOS music player for people who buy music
blogPost.author: Ed Wellbrook

localize.description: 多普达是一款设计精美的音乐播放器，专为购买音乐的人设计和打造。导入音乐和播放列表进行离线收听，并在不同步的情况下编辑歌曲和专辑封面和信息。现在支持Siri、Spotlight搜索和CarPlay。
localize.tagline: 为购买音乐的人准备的iOS音乐播放器

localize.description: 多普達是一款設計精美的音樂播放器，專爲購買音樂的人設計和打造。導入音樂和播放列表進行離線收聽，並在不同步的情況下編輯歌曲和專輯封面和信息。現在支持Siri、Spotlight搜索和CarPlay。
localize.tagline: 爲購買音樂的人準備的iOS音樂播放器

previous.excerpt: June is instant product analytics - just connect your Segment account. ⚡️ Fast and easy to set up (< 2 minutes) 🤯 No expertise required 📊 Instant Reports 📚 Out-of-the-box Templates 👉 Give it a try: https://june.so

next.excerpt: Go Mail Merge enables you to send bulk personalized emails with personalized attachments easily from Google Sheets. Create email campaigns with Gmail and Google Sheets. Personalize & track each email sent.
next.title: Go Mail Merge - Send bulk personalized emails with personalized attachments

localize.description: Go Mail Merge使您能够轻松地从Google Sheets发送带有个性化附件的批量个性化电子邮件。使用Gmail和Google Sheets创建电子邮件活动。个性化和跟踪每封邮件的发送。
localize.tagline: 发送带有个性化附件的批量个性化电子邮件。
